Description:
We are seeking a highly motivated and talented Junior Showroom Sales Executive for a well reputed Showroom that deals exclusively for IT products. Job Description:Greet everyone and present a friendly atmosphere for all customers to the Showroom.·        Communicate with customers in a professional and friendly manner to provide assistance, resolve issues, and answer inquiries related to our gadgets and IT Electronic products.Accomplish the sales targets set by the Management, whilst meeting the organizational goals and addressing day-to-day operational needs objectively and effectively to smoothen the frontline sales.
Should always ensure adequate stock of all our products in the Showroom. Any shortage in the same, should be informed well in prior to the Showroom Manager.
Should be well versed in preparing invoices.
·        Ability to manage multiple customer inquiries simultaneously while maintaining attention to detail and providing accurate information specific to IT products.Skills
Skills:
Prior experience of 1 to 3 years as a Junior Showroom Sales Executive in IT Electronics division such as a Mobile shop is a must.
Excellent communication skills in English and Arabic are a definite advantage.
Excellent interpersonal negotiation and multi-tasking skills.
Must be well versed in MS Office tools.
Immediate joiners with Visa 18 only apply.
